metadata.title: A Surveillance System to Reduce Transmission of Pandemic H1N1 (2009) Influenza in a 2600-Bed Medical Center

abstract.original_text: Background: Concerns have been raised about how the transmission of emerging infectious diseases from patients to healthcare workers (HCWs) and vice versa could be recognized and prevented in a timely manner. An effective strategy to block transmission of pandemic H1N1 (2009) influenza in HCWs is important.

sentences.segment_text: Background : Concerns have been raised about how the transmission of emerging infectious diseases from patients to healthcare workers ( HCWs ) and vice versa could be recognized and prevented in a timely manner .
